entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 a.m. ADT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 7:00 AM ADT Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NW 50 km/h gust 80 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
